summary: This is an email chain from April 2020 regarding a subpoena for records from FirstBank Puerto Rico. The correspondence involves coordination between individuals to obtain a copy of the subpoena, indicating an ongoing legal or investigative process related to financial records.

events.title: Voice mail regarding FirstBank Puerto Rico
events.description: An individual left a voice mail message for another regarding FirstBank Puerto Rico, requesting a callback.

events.title: Email coordination for subpoena copy
events.description: Email exchange discussing missed calls and coordinating to speak on Monday morning, with a request to email a copy of a subpoena related to FirstBank Puerto Rico.

keyFacts: A subpoena exists for records from FirstBank Puerto Rico, dated December 31, 2019.
The email correspondence from April 2020 shows active coordination to obtain a copy of this subpoena.
The context suggests this is part of a legal or investigative process, likely related to financial records in the Epstein case.
The communication occurred during the early COVID-19 pandemic period, as references are made to working from home.
